directions: Place ground pork sausage in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown.
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt processed cheese.
Drain sausage and mix in a medium bowl with the melted processed cheese, sour cream, diced tomatoes with green chile peppers and green onions.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
title: Sausage Cheese Dip
